Name: Plumber: the Pipe Rush
About the game: Hurry up to prevent the toxic leak! Plumber - the Pipe Rush is a puzzle game of logics and wits. Your goal is to close the pipe before the toxic waste leaks into the water. Plan ahead to avoid deadlocks, use existing pipes to score high (or let them sit for a penalty). - 120 hand-crafted levels - replay to improve your score - win big by utilizing pre-placed pieces - advance to higher levels that require quite some skill
